activity: Cutting or removal of material by putting a high speed spinning disc in contact with the workpiece.

before: Perform a visual inspection of tool and check for any physical damage
Make sure disc is fitted securely and the nut is in the correct way
Ensure nothing is in the tool's path in direction of disc rotation
Ensure no flammable materials are in the vicinity
Ensure correct type of disc is used for operation and type of material
during: Keep hands away from rotating parts.
Ensure workpiece is stable (clamped or similar)
Ensure tool is unplugged during disc change
after: Allow workpiece and disc to cool before touching

controls: Loose clothing and long hair to be tied back.
Tool and workpiece to be left to cool after extended use.
Remove any flammable items from the area

hazard: Loss of control of the tool
controls: Operator is inducted in correct handling of the tool
Safety goggles to be used and the operator is to be inducted on the correct procedure for removing and discs
